description: Mentioned only by Williams, who says: �Bassetto in the Lower Bavarian specifications of Sponsel (1771) probably denotes an octave pedal flute 4', stopped.�
examplesDescription: All known examples are given below.

examples.name: Bassetto 4', Pedale; Chiesa di San Tommaso, Firenze, Italy. Simoni(?) 1882. A light, clear Principal.
